entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:10 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023
